channel.title: [SOLVED] Making An NPC Attack On Sight [PI]
channel.description:
Hey guys, I want to make an NPC that you can't normally attack (Border Guard, ID: 926), attack players on sight. Is there a way to do this?
(I'm using a Border Guard to guard a specific area I don't want players going near. And yes, I know I could just block the area off with barricades and stuff, but this is much cooler :P).

item.title: [SOLVED] Making An NPC Attack On Sight [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman

item.title: [SOLVED] Making An NPC Attack On Sight [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“mrpopyman, post:3, topic:548305”][quote author=Ashi link=topic=667209.msg4461915#msg4461915 date=1417930969]
Make the NPC aggressive
[/quote]
Yes, but how?[/quote]
NPCHandler.java
search for the word aggressive.
Find the switch statement,
add your npc.

Read full topic
